properties.Observatio: Located in Puhulpola GND. Reserve land is being illegally acquired because the boundaries are not marked. This area may be about  5 acre of which about 25% are large trees. The spring water flowing from this reserve is used for agricultural purposes.
properties.Descriptio:
Vegetative cover improving around the reservation Area nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedling and  planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid interval
